attributes.action: China  'Clubbed Dogs To Death At Abattoirs'
attributes.additional_details: Animal rights campaigners have released pictures and video footage which appear to show dogs being clubbed to death at an abattoir in China. killing tens of thousands of dogs every day.One man is filmed beating a dog around the head before carrying its motionless body through a room, while other animals with their fur removed are seen lying on floors covered in blood.
